summary: Graduate geophysicist and remote sensing analyst with experience in near-surface and deep earth geophysical imaging, geophysical data inversion and satellite mapping. An experienced leader and team player with problem-solving skills and abilities to multitask in a multidisciplinary environment.

projects: [{'title': 'Performance Management Systems and Service Delivery In Selected Public Corporations In Osun State ', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': 'As a Research Assistant, I collected primary data for this thesis using the questionnaire method, analysed the data using Statistical Package for the Social Sciences\xa0(SPSS) and interpreted the results.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Stephen', 'last_name': 'Akinremi', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Researcher at University of Twente'}]}, {'title': 'Confirmatory Geotechnical Investigation for Ilobu Earth Dam, Osun State', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': 'Soil Investigation for Dam Embankment and Spillway Structure. \nClient: Gojopal Nigeria LTD, Abuja.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Stephen', 'last_name': 'Akinremi', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Researcher at University of Twente'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'John', 'last_name': 'Akinremi', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Data Analyst Intern'}]}, {'title': 'Application of Integrated Geophysical and Geotechnical Methods to Site Investigation: A Case Study of the New Senate Building, Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife.', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': 'Collected and analysis Geotechnical data which included soil samples, Dynamic Cone Penetrometer Test, water samples.
